changelog: feat: Complete Pomodoro timer implementation with audio support and configurable settings.
feat: Advanced power management controls with auto-dim, low battery notifications, and suspend options.
feat: Enhanced CaffeineButton with multi-monitor support and global keybind toggle.
feat: Improved dock window matching with tokenization for better app identification.
feat: Refactored brightness control to use percentage values for better UX.
improvement: Enhanced gesture bindings for cleaner Hyprland integration.
improvement: Added pulseaudio-utils dependency for better audio control.
fix: Brightness not appearing in brightnessctl devices
